content: Hi, I've been waiting for the new shipment of SmartWatches. Can you please let me know when it will arrive?
Sorry to hear that! Our latest reports indicate that the new shipment is expected to arrive within the next 3-5 business days. You will receive an email with tracking information as soon as it ships.
That's great news, thanks for the update. However, I noticed that my SmartWatch hasn't arrived yet and I'm still waiting for my refund from the previous order.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check on your refund status for you. Can you please provide your order number so I can look into this further?
My order number is #1234. I've already contacted customer support, but they just kept referring me back to the report from last week. I don't have access to that anymore.

I'm happy to help you with this issue. However, I don't have any information on a previous report from last week. Can you please provide more context or details about what was discussed in the report?
